name: techflow-landing
description: Modern landing page for TechFlow - Advanced Automation Solutions

scripts.build: echo 'No build process needed for static site'
scripts.git:feature: echo 'Use: git checkout develop && git pull && git checkout -b feature/name'
scripts.git:bugfix: echo 'Use: git checkout develop && git pull && git checkout -b bugfix/name'
scripts.git:hotfix: echo 'Use: git checkout main && git pull && git checkout -b hotfix/name'
scripts.git:sync: git fetch origin && git merge origin/develop
scripts.git:cleanup: git branch --merged develop | grep -v '\*\|develop\|main' | xargs -n 1 git branch -d

author: TechFlow Team
